full_description:
Huawei Watch GT 3 Active Edition Smart Watch

Huawei Watch GT 3 Active Edition Smart Watch has a 42 mm dial that catches the light on the 3D curved glass with a soft, water-like glow. It adopts a simplistic body design with a high-gloss finish, accompanied by refined straps for a modern, sophisticated look. HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 46 mm has a 1.43 inches 466X466 pixels AMOLED Colour Screen Display and an overall 11 mm case thickness. weight is approximately 42.6 g (without strap) 22 mm strap width. Get the look to fit your style. Choose from outer space, sports theme, minimalist design, and thousands more watch faces, and put them on the Always On Display dial to light up your mood. Play mix-and-match with a rich variety of straps to shine on any occasion. Use the rotating crown to zoom in and out of the apps on the board and quickly access your target function. With a high refresh rate, you can easily set the volume and alarm time even when your hands are wet, giving you a smooth, seamless experience.

More than 100 Sports modes

Supporting more than 100 sports modes like running, cycling, hiking, swimming, jumping rope, and skiing. Whether you're dipping in the pool or sweating it out on the field, you can enjoy your workout to the fullest. You can also use the watch to play music so that you can match your running time with an exclusive BGM to take the monotony out of exercise. When exercising, the watch can be linked to different sports equipment and apps. Heart rate and other data from the watch can be synced with equipment like treadmills, ellipticals, rowing machines, etc., and you can sync the data with mainstream third-party sports apps via HUAWEI Health App, to help you evaluate and adjust your exercise status in time. HUAWEI AppGallery for Watch brings together many apps for download and more excitement for you to explore.

Accurate Heart Rate Monitoring

HUAWEI TruSeen 5.0+ presents a newly upgraded heart rate module that includes eight photodiodes in a circular layout and two sets of light-source. Combined with a curved glass lens for comfortable wear, it significantly reduces external interference; the AI algorithm has been upgraded to filter out noisy signals more effectively, allowing accurate heart rate monitoring even during strenuous exercise, and improving the accuracy of health data such as blood oxygen.

All-Day SpO2 and health Monitoring

Blood oxygen saturation (SpO2) is one of the important vital signs that can reflect the oxygen supply of the body. HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 automatically provides 24-hour SpO2 level detection no matter when you are working, exercising, or sleeping, which carefully protects your health around the clock. The watch can keep track on your sleep to help you form a sleep routine, monitor your heart rate, regulate your breathing and relieve tension when you are stressed. It also records your menstrual cycle as well as body conditions13 to put your mind at ease, so you can relax and enjoy life.

Dual-Band Five-System GNSS. with Route Back Navigation

With support for GPS, Beidou, GLONASS, Galileo, and QZSS satellite systems, the watch offers stronger anti-interference performance, which effectively improves the strength and stability of outdoor positioning signals. Your workouts can be accurately recorded and every drop of sweat counts. The HUAWEI WATCH GT 3's L1 and L5 dual-band signals provide higher signal immunity, enabling accurate positioning. With accurate offline navigation, HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 offers a Route Back feature that can guide you back when you lose directions. Like a seasoned guide, it gives voice suggestions on estimated arrival time, remaining distance, and recommended routes when you are exploring new destinations. When the workouts are completed, it automatically generates travel routes on the Huawei Health app, so you can share7 and invite your friends to join, or save them for future revisits.

All-day Weather monitoring

The watch tells the time of sunrise and sunset every day, supports different moon phases display, and keeps you informed of tidal changes in real-time. The built-in altitude barometer monitors the current air pressure in real-time and alerts you in case of drastic changes before the onset of extreme weather conditions, adding an extra protective device for your outdoor adventures.

Your Personal AI Running Coach

The HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 can assess your athletic ability based on your historical running data, and provide you with a scientific and professional running plan for your daily running and race preparation, whether you are a beginner or an advanced runner, and provide you with full tracking guidance. During the training cycle, the training program can be adjusted automatically and regularly based on the actual course execution and data feedback, helping you to improve your training efficiency and achieve your running goals with more ease. Based on monitoring indicators such as pace, heart rate, and running distance, it intelligently evaluates the running index and training stress, as well as the training load, recovery level, and recovery heart rate, providing professional training advice for you to better plan the training intensity and time to improve the quality of training.

Durable Battery Life, Wireless Charging

HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 supports wireless charging5, so you can use your phone to reverse charge it when you forget your charger5 and say goodbye to battery life anxiety. On a full charge, HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 46 mm lasts up to 14 days1 and HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 42 mm lasts up to 7 days1, so you're fully prepared to keep track of your every workout and not miss out on any health check.

Make Calls on Watch

Connect HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 to your smartphone via Bluetooth when you are outdoor exercising, doing house chores or cooking, and take pleasure in the convenience of viewing call history, answering, and rejecting calls on the watch.Huawei Watch GT 3 Active Edition Smart Watch offers a 6-month replacement Warranty.

full_description:
Huawei Watch GT 3 Pro Ceramic Lady Smart Watch

Huawei Watch GT 3 Pro Ceramic Lady Smart Watch has a Nanocrystalline Ceramic body. It is specially designed for ladies. The distinguishing white ceramic case is unforgettable at first glance. This timepiece has undergone an extremely high temperature of 1500 degrees Celsius and is finished by diamond powder polishing to achieve a pure-white and flawless texture fascinating to the eyes, also breathable and comfortable on the wrist. It has a Nanocrystalline Ceramic Body with a Sapphire watch dial shimmering white nano-ceramics accompanied by a sapphire crystal glass dial, here is a unique look to thrive on any occasion. The Shell-Printed Stainless steel bezel is inspired by the ripples of time, 24 shell curves rise and fall, witnessing the change of day and night. It also has a spherical Ceramic Rotatable Crown and a metal ECG Button. The carved stainless steel crown incorporates a sleek colored metal ECG pusher, with a spherical ceramic embedding on one side to add a touch of stereoscopic elegance. High-transmitting sapphire glass makes high-precision sensor measurements more accurate and is integrated with the ceramic materials for a neat fit and comfortable wear. The watch is offered in a light gold bezel on the white ceramic strap, and silver bezel on a white leather strap,3 both can make a difference with all-time charm. Explore an array of unique dial faces, especially the exclusive Day and Night theme that changes with sunrises and moon phases. The watch also supports a screen-off time display, a custom face design from your phone gallery, and other features. Find out more designs available from Huawei Watch Face Store. The ECG app packs a high-performance ECG sensor module, which provides single-lead ECG measurements, real-time analysis, sinus rhythm, atrial fibrillation, and premature atrial and ventricular beat reminders, to stay informed and proactive about major heart health-related risks. New and improved electrode technology has made ECG signal collection more accurate and responsive, with the addition of PVD-coated electrodes on the curved, transparent sapphire case back, resulting in a comfortable, skin-tight fit. Just touch the electrode on the side for 30 seconds, and real-time results can be shown on your watch after the measurement.

Smart Heart Rate Monitoring with Real-Time Alerts

HUAWEI TruSeen 5.0+ heart rate monitoring technology deploys eight photoelectric sensors in a ring formation, to capture enhanced signals. An all-new algorithm filters out interference, for meticulously heart rate monitoring. You can even monitor your heart rate on a 24/7 basis, with real-time alerts whenever your heart rate strays from its normal range. The watch packs high-performance ECG and PPG sensors, for pro-level arterial stiffness detection5 to help you screen for arteriosclerosis, as well as helpful tips on how to bolster your cardiovascular health. With SpO2 measurements, made possible by HUAWEI TruSeen 5.0+ heart rate monitoring technology, you can rest assured. Keep track of your menstruation cycles7 and estimate ovulation date with this smartwatch. HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 Pro can send you reminders according to the records and help you prepare for the special days.

Health and Other features

The HUAWEI TruSleep 2.0 sleep monitoring algorithm identifies key sleep states, with sleep quality scores and personalized advice on how to get the best possible night's rest. An ever-ready stress monitor8 is on hand to track and manage any daily trials and tribulations, with calming breathing exercises to help ease your mind. Healthy living check-in tasks9 make your well-being a satisfying, goal-oriented process, from sleep to drinking water to workouts and many more! HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 Pro comes with IP68 and 5 ATM ratings for water resistance and has withstood a staggering 200 water pressure cycles, so that it supports free dives as deep as 30 meters,10 making it the perfect companion for all of your undersea adventures. It features airtight safety reminder settings like automatic reminders if you descend too deep or for too long. The Apnea training mode records your heart rate, breath-holding duration, and the start time of diaphragm contraction, to help increase how long you can hold your breath so that you'll be better prepared for advanced underwater challenges. Activate the camera on your phone with the remote shutter feature12 and capture memorable moments with a few simple taps on your wrist.

More than 100 Sport mode

With over 100 workouts to choose from — running, cycling, mountain climbing, indoor swimming, skiing, and beyond you can hit the open road, or blaze a new trail, with just a tap on the screen! Data-driven running metrics including running ability index, training pressure, training load, and tips help you maximize performance without overtaxing your body, and sharable running routes put your prowess on full display! With a wealth of third-party apps13 available for download through Watch AppGallery, everything you need can be accessed with just a flick of the wrist.

Call from your Smartwatch

Answer Bluetooth calls directly on your watch. Answer and reject incoming calls, send out custom quick replies, view call logs, and view call logs to make your life easier. You can Listen on the go. The watch can sync playlists from your phone, and play your favorite tunes on its own during workouts.14 So slip on a pair of Bluetooth earphones, and get moving, without ever being weighed down. The watch pairs seamlessly with smart devices. From Huawei devices to iOS and Android phones,15 HUAWEI WATCH GT 3 Pro will work hand-in-hand from the convenience of your wrist. Huawei Watch GT 3 Pro Ceramic Lady Smart Watch offers a 6-month Replacement Warranty.
